benchmark_details.name: LongCodeBench (LCB)
benchmark_details.overview: LongCodeBench (LCB) is a benchmark to test coding LLMs in long-context scenarios, evaluating their comprehension and repair capabilities using tasks derived from real-world GitHub issues.
benchmark_details.data_type: question-answering pairs and code repair tasks

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for evaluating long-context language models on realistic coding tasks.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on correctness of answers for LongCodeQA and execution results for LongSWE-Bench.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate how well models comprehend and repair code issues based on a passing rate of unit tests and accuracy of answer selection.
methodology.validation: Results validated against established performance standards for coding tasks.
